text: “dharmaya himi ayavaḷuni! allāhvada, taman veta pahaḷa karana lada (mema dharmaya)da, meyaṭa pera (obaṭa) pahaḷa karana lada dæyada, api viśvāsa kirīma misa, vena kisiyam væræddak oba apa veta dakinnehuda?”yi (nabiyē! oba ovungen vimasā) “niyata vaśayenma obagen væḍi deneku pāpatarayan vaśayen siṭinnehuya. (obaṭa sarilana phalavipāka nirayayi)” yayi pavasanu mænava
